Topic.Title: Transferring the game to HTML has some publishing problems

Posts.EditableText:
All in reference to **THE WORLD ENDS TODAY, I THINK…**, a game I made a while ago.
Here’s the link to it. You can also find it by clicking my profile: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/pnmno4m7guu6zyjropbleg/the-world-ends-today-i-think

Number 1:
I want to wave my squiffy flag high and proud, but publishing the zip file causes the website to label it as html instead of squiffy. This is probably inevitable, but I’m posting in case there IS a solution.

Number 2:
The game doesn’t save progress anymore! When you close the website, nothing is saved and you start back at square one. This issue is especially frustrating for my game. How come? 

Thanks for your help!
